sub_title: MD, PhD, EACVI certified Cardiologist and researcher
summary: Experienced Cardiologist with a demonstrated history of working in the medical practice industry. Skilled in Epidemiology, Healthcare, Clinical Research, Cardiac MRI, and Medical Education. Strong healthcare services professional with a Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) focused in 123I-mIBG assessed cardiac sympathetic activity: standardizing towards clinical implementation from University of Amsterdam.
